name: roon-extension-web-testapp
description: Roon Extension to test Roon API functionality in a Web Browser
author: Roon Labs, LLC

scripts.build: browserify app.js -o bundle.js -t partialify -u xml2js -u ws -u fs -u network
scripts.dev: watchify -d  app.js -o bundle.js -t partialify -u xml2js -u ws -u fs -u network
